MarketData.title: MarketData
MarketData.description: Represents market data for a specific vegetable or fruit.

id.description: Unique identifier for the market data entry.

vegetableName.description: Name of the vegetable or fruit.

marketName.description: Name of the market where the data was collected.

pricePerKg.description: Price per kilogram of the vegetable/fruit in INR.

date.description: Date when the market data was recorded.

adminId.description: Reference to the Admin who uploaded this data. (Relationship: Admin 1:N MarketData)

WeatherUpdate.title: WeatherUpdate
WeatherUpdate.description: Represents weather information for a specific region.

id.description: Unique identifier for the weather update.

region.description: The geographical region for which the weather data is relevant.

condition.description: General weather condition (e.g., Sunny, Cloudy, Rainy).

date.description: Date and time of the weather update.

location.description: The location of the farmer's farm.

ForumPost.title: ForumPost
ForumPost.description: Represents a post in the community forum.

id.description: Unique identifier for the forum post.

farmerId.description: Reference to the Farmer who created the post. (Relationship: Farmer 1:N ForumPost)

dateCreated.description: Date and time when the post was created.

authorAvatarId.description: ID for the author's avatar image.

ForumComment.title: ForumComment
ForumComment.description: Represents a comment on a forum post.

id.description: Unique identifier for the forum comment.

postId.description: Reference to the ForumPost this comment belongs to. (Relationship: ForumPost 1:N ForumComment)

farmerId.description: Reference to the Farmer who created the comment. (Relationship: Farmer 1:N ForumComment)

dateCreated.description: Date and time when the comment was created.
